Definition: This task involves asking a question, providing a set of 2 options and also a search result URL as input. You are expected to choose the best answer to the question based on information in the search result. The output will be in the form of A or B, corresponding to which option is chosen. Note that the search result may or may not provide relevant information that can be used to answer the question. If the information contained in the search result is not relevant to the question or provides information that does not answer the question appropriately, the answer selection will be incorrect.

Positive Examples.input: Question:Who was the man behind The Chipmunks? ,  Options: [A. David Seville, B. Alvin Seville],  Search result URL:www.imdb.com/title/tt0952640
Positive Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the movie and how David Seville was the man behind the Chipmunks

Positive Examples.input: Question:What star sign is Jamie Lee Curtis? ,  Options: [A. Gemini, B. Scorpio] ,  Search result URL:www.astrotheme.com/astrology/Jamie_Lee_Curtis
Positive Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the star sign of Jamie Lee Curtis and indicates it is Scorpio

Positive Examples.input: Question: Which Lloyd Webber musical premiered in the US on 10th December 1993? ,  Options: [A. Sunset Boulevard, B. the Phantom of the Opera] ,  Search result URL:www.andrewlloydwebber.com/shows
Positive Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the shows performed by Lloyd Webber and states that his musical premier in the US was with Sunset Boulevard.

Positive Examples.input: Question: The Euro is divided into how many cents? ,  Options:[A. 13000, B. 100] ,  Search result URL: www.coursehero.com/file/p4e3hgo/The-euro-is-divided-into...
Positive Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the Euro and that it is divided into 100 cents.

Negative Examples.input: Question:Who was the man behind The Chipmunks? ,  Options: [A. David Seville, B. Alvin Seville] ,  Search result URL:www.aatc.wikia.com/wiki/Alvin_Seville
Negative Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the movie and how Alvin Seville was the man behind the Chipmunks. B is an incorrect answer.

Negative Examples.input: Question:What star sign is Jamie Lee Curtis? ,  Options:[A. Gemini, B. Scorpio] ,  Search result URL:www.biography.com/people/tony-curtis-9263844
Negative Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the star Tony Curtis. Does not provide inofrmation about the star sign of Jamie Lee Curtis. It returns Tony Curtis is a 'Gemini' amd thus option A. This is an incorrect answer.

Negative Examples.input: Question: Which Lloyd Webber musical premiered in the US on 10th December 1993?  ,  Options: [A. Sunset Boulevard, B. the Phantom of the Opera] ,  Search result URL:www.thephantomoftheopera.com/history/timeline
Negative Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the show The Phantom of the Opera, which is also a musical. B is an incorrect answer to the question.

Negative Examples.input: Question: The Euro is divided into how many cents?  ,  Options:[A. 13000, B. 100] ,  Search result URL: www.fairlabor.org/sites/default/files/bangladesh_benchmarks_and...
Negative Examples.explanation: On clicking this Search result URL, the link takes us to a passage with information about the Bangaladesh Taka(BDT) and other currencies in Bangaladesh. It chooses option A. This is an incorrect answer.
